author: Christina Maxouris and Joe Sutton, CNN
title: Missouri is suing China over coronavirus impacts saying the country did 'little to stop the spread of the disease'
description: Missouri is suing the Chinese government and other top institutions for the role they played in the coronavirus pandemic and the effects it has had on the state, accusing the country of covering up information, silencing whistleblowers and doing little to sto…
